summary: Provides utility components for interacting with an HBase Thrift server within the Feast feature store. Includes a connector class that manages HappyBase connections and offers highâ€‘level operations such as creating, deleting, and checking tables, as well as inserting, fetching, and batch processing feature data. Also defines immutable constants and mappings between HBase column identifiers and feature names used by the online store.
business_intent: Enable the online serving layer of Feast to read and write feature values efficiently in HBase by abstracting connection handling, table lifecycle, and data access patterns.
